pages.text: $(li)Skeletons are common undead hostile creatures that can be found over the Overworld when the night arrives or in places with low lighting.$(br)$(li)They will fire Arrows using their Bows.$(br)$(li)They may drop Bones and Arrows on death.
They will start to burn in contact with the sunlight.

$(li)Tiny Skeletons are a cute variant of the common Skeletons and they can be found over the Overworld when the night arrives or in places with low lighting.$(br)$(li)They are faster than Skeletons.$(br)$(li)They will fire Arrows using their Bows.$(br)$(li)They may drop Bones and Arrows on death.
They will start to burn in contact with the sunlight.
